designSystem.name: Cartoon Meme Header Bar
designSystem.description: A design system for creating a playful, cartoonish website header. The core aesthetic is defined by thick, hand-drawn-style black outlines, rounded shapes, and a clean, high-contrast layout. It mimics the style of modern webcomics and meme culture.

fontFamily.logo_and_buttons: 'Lilita One', 'Bangers', or a similar bold, chunky, sans-serif comic-style font.

header_bar.description: The main container for all header elements, designed to look like a single, solid object floating on the page.
header_bar.shape: A long, horizontal, pill-shaped rectangle with fully rounded ends (high border-radius).

elements.name: Logo Area
elements.content: Contains the brand logo icon and text.

elements.name: Navigation Area
elements.content: A horizontal list of text-based navigation links.

elements.name: Action Area
elements.content: A group containing language selectors, social media icons, and the main call-to-action button.

main_container.description: The defining visual shell of the header.

circular_icon.description: Style for social media or language selector icons.

logo.layout: A circular icon placed immediately to the left of the brand name text.
logo.icon_style: Circular, with a thick black border, containing cartoon imagery.

designStyle.core_principle: The defining characteristic is the use of thick, solid black borders on all major container and interactive elements (header bar, buttons, icons). This creates a cohesive, hand-drawn, 'sticker-like' aesthetic.
designStyle.spacing: Generous spacing between element groups (logo, nav, actions) to maintain a clean and uncluttered look despite the bold style.
